merger.pattern: .*(Teardown) \S+ connection \S+ for outside:(\S+)/\d+ to inside:(\S+)/\d+ duration \S+ bytes \d+.*
.*(Built inbound) TCP connection \S+ for outside:(\S+)/\d+.* to inside:(\S+)/\d+.*
.*(Built outbound) TCP connection \S+ for outside:(\S+)/\d+.* to inside:(\S+)/\d+.*
.*(Deny) TCP (no connection) from (\S+)/\d+ to (\S+)/\d+ flags \S+ on interface \S+
